headline: Is Tariff An Issue For Restaurant Sector? J.P. Morgan Highlights Winners & Losers
summary: Last week, J.P. Morgan analyst John Ivankoe hosted Bloomin’ Brands Inc (NASDAQ:BLMN), CAVA Group Inc (NYSE:CAVA), Brinker International Inc (NYSE:EAT), and Sweetgreen Inc (NYSE:SG) at the J.P. Morgan Las Vegas forum. The analyst noted that the key takeaway from all four companies was the focus on doing “fewer things better” and consistently reinvesting in customer and employee experiences. According to the analyst, stock volatility has created opportunities, with the current 10-year yield of 4.3

According to the analyst, stock volatility has created opportunities, with the current 10-year yield of 4.3

headline: Starbucks Stock Is Down 15% This Month. Time to Buy?
summary: Brian Niccol turned around Taco Bell and Chipotle. Can he work the same magic at Starbucks?

raw.headline: Starbucks Stock Is Down 15% This Month. Time to Buy?
raw.summary: Brian Niccol turned around Taco Bell and Chipotle. Can he work the same magic at Starbucks?

headline: The restaurant industry’s Q4 2024 winners and losers
summary: Consumer price sensitivity has hit brands unevenly, with Applebee’s and Starbucks suffering extended traffic declines while Chili’s pumped its traffic up with a strong value offer.

raw.headline: The restaurant industry’s Q4 2024 winners and losers
raw.summary: Consumer price sensitivity has hit brands unevenly, with Applebee’s and Starbucks suffering extended traffic declines while Chili’s pumped its traffic up with a strong value offer.

headline: Hong Kong Caps IPO Margin Loans Amid Heated Retail Demand
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Hong Kong’s market regulator capped the amount of margin loans that can be used to buy shares at initial public offerings to clamp down on excessive demand from retail investors.
